p: In the unidirectional reverse genetics plasmid driving the synthesis of segment 6 (NA) vRNA of WSN, sequences of the NC regions were exchanged by those of each of the other segments to generate seven chimeric segment 6 vRNA constructs ( Fig. 1a and Supplementary Table S1). Each construct was named X-NA- X, where X- represents the segment origin of the 3′NC region, NA, the neuraminidase coding region including its natural stop codon, and - X, the segment origin of the 5′NC region.
